Class Interval2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Interval2D

  • public class Interval2D
extends java.lang.Object
    The Interval2D class represents a closed two-dimensional interval, which represents all points (x, y) with both xleft <= x <= xright and yleft <= y <= right. Two-dimensional intervals are immutable: their values cannot be changed after they are created. The class Interval2D includes methods for checking whether a two-dimensional interval contains a point and determining whether two two-dimensional intervals intersect.

    For additional documentation, see Section 1.2 of Algorithms, 4th Edition by Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne.

    Author:
    Robert Sedgewick, Kevin Wayne
